title: Computer crashed and restarted, cant reconnect to game
body:
Computer froze and then crashed, force restarting itself.
Upon logging back into client, it gave no option to reconnect, even though it still says "game in progress"
Am afraid of queue ban right now, even though this isn't my fault
All i wanted to do was wall jump as talon
EDIT: Please respond quickly

replies.body: Did this match end up showing up in your match history afterward? If not, then the gameserver may have encountered a hiccup.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=wcer6P2E,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-02-09T02:28:33.697+0000)
>
> Did this match end up showing up in your match history afterward? If not, then the gameserver may have encountered a hiccup.
Yes it did show up in my match history, but I received no bans or punishment. It sucks I couldn't reconnect, but at least nothing bad happened to me
